definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to let go of the big prize while grabbing at trifles (idiom)
pinyin: jian3 le5 zhi1 ma5 diu1 le5 xi1 gua1

definition: all is grist that comes to the mill (idiom)
pinyin: jian3 dao4 lan2 li3 jiu4 shi4 cai4

definition: (slang) to target an intoxicated person for sexual assault
bone-gathering, a custom of Fujian and Taiwan in which a son recovers the bones of his deceased father from the grave and places them in an urn for permanent storage at a different location

sentences.english: Did anyone find a small canvas bag ?
sentences.chinese: 有没有人捡到一个摄影包？

sentences.english: To learn to type, seldom at ordinary times used phoneticize also was collected rise.
sentences.chinese: 为了学打字，平时不常用的拼音也捡了起来。

sentences.english: Someone put me into a mail sorter.
sentences.chinese: 有人把我放进了一个邮件分捡机。

sentences.english: The Spurs might have found another steal in the draft.
sentences.chinese: 马刺很有可能又一次在选修环节中捡了一个大便宜。

sentences.english: You are no longer to supply the people with straw for making bricks; let them go and gather their own straw.
sentences.chinese: 你们不可照常把草给百姓作砖，叫他们自己去捡草。

sentences.english: That formerly how to pick, time flies straight forward.
sentences.chinese: 翀那段从前怎么去捡，光阴似箭一直向前。

sentences.english: By various sacrifices his parents sent him through middle school.
sentences.chinese: 父母省吃捡用，供他上完中学。

sentences.english: Golgi to school, only to pick up trash money.
sentences.chinese: 高尔基为了上学，只得去捡垃圾换钱。

sentences.english: The farmer secretly hid the yellow dirt which was picked up by the roadside.
sentences.chinese: 这个农民把在路边捡到的黄金悄悄地藏了起来。

sentences.english: And the next thing I know, I am on the ground harvesting chanterelles.
sentences.chinese: 不知不觉的，我又在地上捡酒杯蘑菇了。

sentences.english: Lin Pingzhi picked up cassock secretly run away quickly.
sentences.chinese: 林平之捡了袈裟赶紧偷偷跑掉。

sentences.english: Rubbish collectors are following behind the procession picking up discarded bottles, bound to be making a big fortune today.
sentences.chinese: 捡废气瓶子的拾荒者跟在队伍后面，他们也收获颇丰。

sentences.english: As he picked up the purse,the money dropped out.
sentences.chinese: 他捡钱包时，钱掉了出来。

sentences.english: By just picking up litter and refraining from littering we are doing meritorious deeds.
sentences.chinese: 能不乱丢垃圾，随时清捡垃圾，都是做的功德。

sentences.english: Is this your book? I found it under the desk.
sentences.chinese: 这是你的笔吗？我在桌下捡到的。

sentences.english: That tree had with the person picking Xiang Sidou again there?
sentences.chinese: 曾经在那树下一起捡相思豆的人又在那里？

definition: to choose/to pick/to sort out/to pick up
to pile up/to heap up/a mass/pile/heap/stack/large amount
to push lightly/to flick to one side/to get rid of
to discard in the wrong place (cigarette butts etc)/to leave one's things lying around
